content.description: Starts with 2 hands on a big sloper, and then work your way underneath the boulder following the juggy cracks. Work your way up the bottom until you need to make a big move to the top side of the boulder. Finish with a solid mantle. I don't want to give too much beta because this line just needs to be experienced in person. Following the Picture with the Route on it will be best for figuring it out. This route is one of the most beautiful I have ever put my fingers on, and is a must do if in Sequoia NP.
content.protection: Bring Pads if you are scared to fall. Also be careful because you can fall off the side of the mountain.
content.location: It is the only boulder in the at the Hanging Rock Location. And it is on the Hanging Rock
